articles.title: What AI data centers are doing to your electric bill : Planet Money - NPR

articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Elon Musk’s $56B Tesla pay package restored by Delaware Supreme Court - TechCrunch
articles.description: The decision brings to a close a years-long court battle that irked Musk so much he moved Tesla's incorporation from Delaware to Texas.
articles.content: The Delaware Supreme Court has reinstated Elon Musk’s $56 billion Tesla pay package from 2018, overturning last year’s ruling by the state’s Chancery Court, according to an opinion published Friday.… [+2126 chars]
